channel.title: Fire Emblem Heroes FM - Game Thread - Integrity Breach - Canceled
channel.description:
![fire-emblem-heroes|690x388](upload://bnGzW656pRIYopFjJekoYAvKIv5.jpeg)
Hosted by @eevee and @Icibalus and @Mercenary
# -Rules- General forun rules apply. No quoting/screenshoting mod communication. No contacting others out of thread about this game, unless allowed by host. Be nice to each other.
# -Mechanical Information- * This game will have 48 hour days and 24 hour nights. * Lynches will be decided by plurlality only due to the high number of events. * The most important thing to note is this: Players are not assigned explicit roles in this game. Instead, players are almost entirely (small exceptions allowed) composed of **Summoners** . All Summoners have a selection of **heroes**. * **Heroes** have a rating (1 to 5 stars) and abilities connected to them. 1 star heroes cannot perform any action while for others - number of stars dictates the power of ability. * At any moment **Players** can exchange **Summoning Orbs** for random hero rank 1 hero from any avilable **Summon focus**. * **Summoning** orbs can be aquired through **events** and specific **heroes**. * Every day avilable **Summon focuses** will be posted. They contain few heroes grouped under some category (for example: "support roles", "sword users", "FE:Fates heroes") * If a player was to receive a duplicate of **hero**, that hero rank will be increased by 1 instead. * **Events** will be announced at least 1h before start. * Scum faction has asigned factional kill wich can be used alongside other actions. * Anti-claim mechanics might or might not exist.
## Events were created in a way that even less active players can take part in them.
# -Example Rolecard-
> # [color=green]Askran Summoner[/color] > > You are a Summoner aligned with the[color=green] **Askran Kingdom** [/color] You start the game with the following Heroes: > > * [color=blue] **Icibalus - 1 star**[/color] - Weapon - Color - Ability > * [color=Lightgreen]**Eevee - 1 star**[/color] - Weapon - Color - Ability > * [color=red] **Marluxion - 1 star**[/color] - Weapon - Color - Ability > > You win when all threats to the **Askran Kingdom** have been eliminated.
# -Signups- 1. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ - Killed D3 - [color=green] **Askran Summoner**[/color] 2. Shurian 3. Margaret 4. ~~Livicus~~ - Lynched D1 - [color=yellow]**Laegjarn**[/color] 5. ~~GamerPoke~~ - Shot D2 - **CLEANED** 6. ~~BlueStorm~~ - Killed N1 - [color=green] **Askran Summoner**[/color] 7. Lightsin 8. NinjaPenguin 9. ~~Luxy~~ Killed N2 - [color=red] **Emblan Summoner**[/color] 10. ~~MaximusPrime~~ - Killed N1 - [color=green] **Askran Summoner**[/color] 11. PokemonKidRyan 12. ~~Insanity~~ - Died D2 - [color=red] **Emblan Summoner**[/color] 13. ~~Marluxion~~ - Lynched D2 - [color=green] **Askran Summoner**[/color] 14. ~~Scattered Mind~~ -> ~~Geyde~~ - Killed N2 - [color=green] **Askran Summoner**[/color] 15. Zone_Q11 16. Twil1ght 17. ~~Firekitten~~ - Killed N2 - [color=green] **Askran Summoner**[/color] 18. Isaac 19. Solic - **REVIVED** 20. aa dono 21. Astand
## -Backup- 1. 2. 3.
## -Timeline- 1. [Event 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-21-21/74208/22) 2. [Event 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-21-21/74208/333) 3. [Event 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-21-21/74208/1110) 4. [Event 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-21-21/74208/1401) 5. [Geyde has replaced Scattered_Mind](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-21-21/74208/2409) 6. [Solic has died to annonymous shot](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-20-21/74208/2502) 7. [Livicus has been lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-19-21/74208/2755) 8. [Day 2 start - 2 deaths, 1 revive](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-18-21-day-2/74208/2851) 9. [Event 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-18-21-day-2/74208/3018) 10. Event 2 11. [Event 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-18-21-day-2-1-replacement-neeeded/74208/3759) 12. [GamerPoke has died to annonymous shot](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-15-21-night-2/74208/5354) 13. [Marluxion has been lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fire-emblem-heroes-fm-game-thread-15-21-night-2/74208/5412)
